issue.title: Simulated LIDAR does not include ring number

content.raw:
[This PR](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/89/lidar-intensity-and-ring/diff) adds intensity and ring. Intensities are all zero though (as I believe it was on Gazebo 9), since the SubT models don't have `<laser_retro>` set.

![subtrings.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2511911189-subtrings.png)

For future reference, [this](https://bitbucket.org/DataspeedInc/velodyne_simulator/src/506664dd478984aa6645d8210802a4a7ddc40629/velodyne_gazebo_plugins/src/GazeboRosVelodyneLaser.cpp#lines-269) was the plugin used with Gazebo 9.
content.html:
This PR adds intensity and ring. Intensities are all zero though (as I believe it was on Gazebo 9), since the SubT models don't have <laser_retro> set.

For future reference, this was the plugin used with Gazebo 9.
